title: Shark Beach with Anthony Mackie
overview: The special follows award-winning actor Mackie in his hometown of New Orleans, where he grew up boating and angling and still practices the sport to date, a passion he now shares with his four sons. Throughout the documentary, Mackie is on a personal mission to keep the peace between coastal communities and sharks. Diving fin-first, he comes face-to-face with the oceanâ€™s apex predators, swimming with several enormous sandbar and silky sharks and tagging a formidable 7-foot bull shark.
